news.description:
Recently, an anti-cheat issue prevented some players from being able to play the game. After reaching out to our partners, we're pleased to say that this issue is now resolved!

As a welcome back gift, Microsoft Store players who log in before March 7, 2022 6PM ET will receive a 500,000 Bloodpoint reward.
news.title: Important: Login Issue Resolved

news.description:
Please be advised that Daily Rituals will reset for everyone as of Chapter 23 (Sadako Rising) on March 8, 2022 11AM ET.

We apologize for the inconvenience. As a thank you, please be sure to login between March 8 2022 11AM ET - March 15 2022 11AM ET for 100K Bloodpoints!
news.title: Important: Daily Rituals

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.5.2 bugfix.

Content
  • Boil Over - Changed to give 33% of current wiggle progress when falling from great heights (was a flat 25% increase)


    • Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused some players to encounter a Grade Reset after updating to patch 5.5.1. Note: This issue was only visual
  • Fixed multiple issues affecting the Nurse


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.5.2 BUGFIX

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.5.1 bugfix.

Content
  • The Coldwind Farm - Fractured Cowshed & Crotus Prenn Asylum - Father Campbell's Chapel maps have been re-enabled


    • Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused the killer music to not change properly when switching roles from a Survivor wearing a 'Modern Tales' outfit
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Cannibal & Demogorgon not to be able to break a pallet


    • Known Issues
  • The Haddonfield map and the Strode Realty Key offerings have been disabled


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.5.1 BUGFIX

news.description:
The Archives returns with a new Tome that asks the important question...Would you like to play a game?

Tome 10: SAW comes complete with new challenges, new rewards, and a deeper glimpse into the memories of Detective Tapp & Amanda Young (The Pig). Let the games begin...
Watch the Tome trailer here: https://youtu.be/27DRVM1M-kM

Watch the Rift trailer here: https://youtu.be/HCFlNM6UlSs

Level Release Schedule
  • Level I: January 26th 11AM ET
  • Level 2: February 9th 11AM ET
  • Level 3: February 23rd 11AM ET
  • Level 4: March 16th 11AM ET


    • Please note these release dates are subject to change. All previously unlocked levels will remain available once released but will stop providing Rift Fragments once the relevant Rift has expired.
news.title: TOME 10: SAW

news.description:
Celebrate The Year of the Tiger in Dead by Daylight!

Surprises lurk around every corner. Some exciting, others deadly. Earn new rewards by participating in the Lurking Stripes Lunar Event!

Receive a gift of 50K Bloodpoints every day from January 25th, 2:00 PM EST until February 8th, 2:00 PM EST.

In addition to daily login rewards, exciting new challenges, Lunar charms, and limited-time gameplay items, unlock exclusive cosmetics for David King, Kate Denson, Jane Romero, The Trapper, The Clown, The Artist, and The Nurse.

Happy Lunar New Year!

For more details: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/LunarEvent
news.title: LURKING STRIPES

news.description:
Welcome to Chapter 22.5! Please read the below for a quick summary of the new content you'll find.

For a full list of patch notes, please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes

IMPORTANT
Due to an increase in file compression, this patch required a download of almost the entire game. Thankfully, this means the game is now ~20GB smaller than usual.
This change is the first step in reducing future patch times, and we appreciate your understanding and patience as we progressively continue to improve patch times.

FEATURES
  • New Features: Interaction Behavior (Hold/Toggle) & Run to Cancel (On/Off)
  • New Wiggle Interaction (Beta, limited time)

    • CONTENT
  • "Lurking Stripes" Lunar New Year limited-time event (starts Jan 25th 2PM ET)
  • "Tome 10: SAW" of The Archives (starts Jan 26th 11AM ET)
  • New voices for Lisa Garland & Cybil Bennett Legendary cosmetics
  • New Cenobite VO lines have been added
  • Multiple updates to add-ons for: Cannibal, Clown, Pig, Twins, Nemesis, Huntress, Oni
  • Multiple updates to Survivor & Killer Perks

    • BUG FIXES
  • Multiple issues affecting The Nurse fixed

    • KNOWN ISSUES
  • The Haddonfield map and the Strode Realty Key offering have been disabled
  • The Coldwind Farm - Fractured Cowshed & The Crotus Prenn Asylum - Father Campbell's Chapel maps have been disabled
news.title: PATCH NOTES

news.description:
The Bone Chill event may be over but we're staying frosty! Stop by every day until January 6th 11AM ET (16:00 UTC) for a new gift of Bloodpoints, Iridescent Shards, or Rift Fragments!

Each gift period begins on the respective day at 11AM ET (16:00 UTC) and ends 24 hours later.
  • Dec. 24th: 50,000 Bloodpoints
  • *Dec. 25th*: 300,000 Bloodpoints + 1,000 Iridescent Shards + 10 Rift Fragments (all available until end of Winter Gift period)
  • Dec. 26th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 27th: 5 Rift Fragments
  • Dec. 28th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 29th: 500 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 30th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 31st: 10 Rift Fragments
  • Jan. 1st: 100,000 Bloodpoints
  • Jan. 2nd: 500 Iridescent Shards
  • Jan. 3rd: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Jan. 4th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Jan. 5th: 500 Iridescent Shards


    • Full Details & Schedule: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/adventcalendar2021
news.title: SEASON OF GIVING

news.description:
Prepare for Ringu to spread its curse throughout The Fog.

A new Chapter inspired by Kōji Suzuki's novel and the original acclaimed film adaptation is coming to Dead by Daylight.

While it'll be a little longer than seven days before you can play this new content, you can click the link below for more on Dead by Daylight's foray into the world of Ringu, coming in March 2022.

ringu.deadbydaylight.com/en
news.title: CHAPTER 23 ANNOUNCEMENT

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.4.2 bugfix.

Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused Killers not being able to kick a side of a generator next to a rock on Grim Pantry
  • Fixed an issue that caused crow swarms to spread to some Survivors incorrectly when The Artist used the Severed Hands add-on
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Prowler achievement to only track progress when playing The Artist
  • Fixed an issue with the Resolution percent slider not changing the resolution on Low/Medium quality


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.4.2 BUGFIX

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.4.2 bugfix.

Bug Fixes
  • Fixed an issue that caused Killers not being able to kick a side of a generator next to a rock on Grim Pantry
  • Fixed an issue that caused crow swarms to spread to some Survivors incorrectly when The Artist used the Severed Hands add-on
  • Fixed an issue that caused the Prowler achievement to only track progress when playing The Artist
  • Fixed an issue with the Resolution percent slider not changing the resolution on Low/Medium quality


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.4.2 BUGFIX

news.description:
Join Amazon Prime and get 2 Artist Outfits!

Available to redeem with Prime Gaming:
  • The Artist - Altered Perception Outfit
  • The Artist - Deluded Perception Outfit


    • Details: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/prime-gaming-x-dead-by-daylight

    Content available from December 10th through January 10th with Prime Gaming. More drops to be revealed soon!

news.description:
Earlier this week, an unexpected outage prevented many people from playing and logging in to collect their advent calendar rewards.

We don't want anyone to miss out, so log in any time between Dec 9 11AM ET - Dec 16 11AM ET for an additional 100,000 Bloodpoints.
news.title: ADVENT CALENDAR UPDATE

news.description:

news.description:
The giving continues alongside the Bone Chill Winter Event! Stop by every day until January 6th 11AM ET (16:00 UTC) for a new gift of Bloodpoints, Iridescent Shards, or Rift Fragments!

Even when the Bone Chill event ends, the gift giving will continue into the new year!

Each gift period begins on the respective day at 11AM ET (16:00 UTC) and ends 24 hours later.
  • Dec. 9th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 10th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 11th: 5 Rift Fragments
  • Dec. 12th: 500 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 13th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 14th: 30,000 Bloodpoints

  • Dec. 17th: 5 Rift Fragments
  • Dec. 18th: 500 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 19th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 20th: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 21st: 500 Iridescent Shards
  • Dec. 22nd: 30,000 Bloodpoints
  • Dec. 23rd: 5 Rift Fragments


    • Full Details & Schedule: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/adventcalendar2021

news.title: SEASON OF GIVING

news.description:
Bundle up and brace yourself for Bone Chill, the newest winter event in Dead by Daylight.

From December 9th - December 23rd, a winter wind will drift into The Fog - and with it, some unexpected visitors. Each Trial will now spawn a group of Snowmen, which can be interacted with by both the Killer and Survivors. Engaging with Snowmen in several unique ways will unlock exclusive Winter reward cosmetics.

Check out the below for more details
Event Trailer: https://youtu.be/WdK_iV_z4_4
Event Blog Post: https://deadbydaylight.com/en/news/winter-2021

UNLOCKABLE REWARDS:
Cosmetics
  • The Wraith - Spine Candy
  • The Hag - Garland Talon
  • Yun-Jin Lee - The Loneliest Time
  • Mikaela Reid - Jolly Holiday Debt
  • Jonah Vasquez - Code-Cracker
  • The Artist - Frosty Eyes
  • The Trickster - Frosty Eyes


    • Charms
  • Gift Hatch
  • Christmas Inferno
  • Cocoa Dip


    • Event Ends December 23rd 11AM ET.

news.description:
Level IV of Tome IX is now available! With it comes the below:
  • 17 Challenges (incl. 4 Master Challenges & 2 Glyph Challenges)
  • 4 Memory and Log Entries (including the final entry for The Observer's Web of the Abyss)
  • More Bloodpoints


    • To access Level IV, you must have reached the Epilogue node of Level III with either role.
news.title: THE OBSERVER'S WEB OF THE ABYSS

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.4.1 bugfix.

Bug Fixes
  • Fixed issues that caused the Crow Food, Sprint & Slash & Beast Awakens archive challenges not to gain progress
  • Fixed an issue that allowed survivors to complete the opening of the hatch when put into dying state
  • Fixed an issue that caused The Artist's Crows' aura to remain visible after downing a Survivor who was repelling crows
  • Fixed an issue that caused the damaging crows not to be counted as protective hits


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.4.1 BUGFIX

news.description:
The game client has been updated to the 5.4.1 bugfix.

Bug Fixes
  • Fixed issues that caused the Crow Food, Sprint & Slash & Beast Awakens archive challenges not to gain progress
  • Fixed an issue that allowed survivors to complete the opening of the hatch when put into dying state
  • Fixed an issue that caused The Artist's Crows' aura to remain visible after downing a Survivor who was repelling crows
  • Fixed an issue that caused the damaging crows not to be counted as protective hits


    • Please see forum.deadbydaylight.com/en/kb/patchnotes for full patch notes.
news.title: 5.4.1 BUGFIX

news.description:
Due to an issue, we have temporarily disabled the system that allows players to receive the Auric Cell charm with a first time Auric Cells purchase.

Players will still be able to purchase Auric Cells packs but will not receive the charm in their inventory for the time being. We are working on a fix to address this and give back the missing charms for players who will have purchased it during that time.
news.title: Auric Cell Charm Disabled
